title: Google Cloud Computing Foundations Certificate
description: Covers cloud fundamentals and core Google Cloud concepts: services overview, IAM basics, networking/storage, and platform operations.

title: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2025 Generative AI Professional
description: Focused on OCI Generative AI capabilities: LLM basics, prompt patterns, model usage in OCI, and practical deployment/guardrails concepts.

title: Prepare Data for ML APIs on Google Cloud (Skill Badge)
description: Hands-on data prep workflows for ML: cleaning, transforming, and validating datasets on Google Cloud to support ML API consumption.
image: /certificates/Prepare Data for ML APIs on Google Cloud (Skill Badge).png

title: Python for Data Science
description: Python for data analysis: core programming, data wrangling, and working with common data-science libraries for analysis workflows.

title: Enterprise Design Thinking Practitioner
description: IBM Enterprise Design Thinking fundamentals: user-centered problem framing, ideation, prototyping, and outcome-driven delivery practices.

title: Machine Learning Specialization
description: Core ML foundations: supervised learning, model evaluation, regularization, and practical workflows for building and improving models.
